project.description: Fixing the education system one Nybbl at a time. Learning has never been so scrummy! Stay tuned!
project.what_we_did: During Railsrumble 2009 we hacked on this one together with out friend Rany. Not only was it lots of fun, but we also got featured afterwards as one of ten RailsRumble Apps that Deserve to Be Startups on Hacker News. Oh yeah!
